heading: Flexibility in deployment
description: Offers support for cloud, on-premises, and hybrid deployment options.

heading: Security and compliance
description: Emphasizes enterprise-grade security features, including regular permissions and comprehensive audit logs.

heading: Real-time collaboration
description: Offers advanced collaboration features such as real-time updates, version control, and shared editing.

heading: Customization with code
description: Enables extensive customization using JavaScript, SQL, and various other programming languages.

heading: Extensive Integrations
description: Provides multiple integrations with databases, APIs, and third-party services.
